Description: Round of data collection (1, 2, 3, etc.)
The state inwhich the data was collected (OR = Oregon or FL = FLorida)
First initial of experimentor and plant number (e.g., A1)
Range of Plant ID's in the cluster (e.g., A1_A6; NA if not in a cluster)

MY = movement
MN = movement
FY = fertilization
FN = no fertilization
HY = host variation
HN = no host variation
(e.g., MY_FY_HY)

Y = yes; cluster of 6 plants with tape around the outer edge of the cluster of pots, so spods can move among plants
N = no; individual plants with tape around the pot, so spods cannot move among plants

Y = yes; with Osmocote fertilizer
N = no; without Osmocote fertilizer

Y = yes; 27 kale and 27 mustard in clusters of 6, 27 individual kale and 27 individual mustard
N = no; 54 kale in clusters of 6, 54 individual kale

K = kale
M = mustard

Initial Leaf Number
Number of Ieaves on the plant before the experiment

Longest Leaf Length
Length of the longest leaf on the plant before the experiment

Final Percent Leaf Damage Leaf Number
Percent damage on each leaf on the plant after the experiment

Total Final Percent Leaf Damage
Sum of Final Percent Leaf Damages of all leaves on the plant after the experiment

Mean Percent Leaf Damage
The average percent damage per leaf on the plant after the experiment
Calculated using Total Final Percent Leaf Damage / Initial Leaf Number

Final Spod Number
Number of spods on the plant after the experiment

Final Spod Location
Location where the spod was found after the experiment
T = on the tape
S = on top of the soil
B = buried in the soil
P = on the plant
C = on the bag
E = escaped bag

Initial Spod Mass Movement
If in a cluster, the total mass of the spods on the 6 plants before the experiment
If not in a cluster, "NA"

Initial Spod Mass
If not in a cluster, the mass of the spod on the plant before the experiment
If in a cluster, the average mass of the spods on the 6 plants before the experiment

Final Spod Mass Movement
If in a cluster, the total mass of the spods on the 6 plants after the experiment
If not in a cluster, "NA"

Final Spod Mass
If not in a cluster, the mass of the spod on the plant after the experiment
If in a cluster, the average mass of the spods on the 6 plants after the experiment

Relative Growth Rate
Calculated using ln(Final Spod Mass) – ln(Initial Spod Mass) / (1 day for rounds 1 and 2, 2 days for rounds 3 and 4)
Based on the equation: (lnW2 – lnW1) / (T2–T1), where W2 is final per capita mass, W1 is initial per capita mass, T2 is final time of herbivory in days, T1 is initial time of herbivory in days
Final leaf area collected from LeafByte
Total Final Leaf Area The sum of the final leaf areas for the plant
Mean Final Leaf Area The average leaf area of the plant Calculated using Total Final Leaf Area / Initial leaf Number
